content: I think I've found a great vintage armchair that could work well with the vase. It's a beautiful, plush velvet armchair from the 1920s with a stunning tufted back and rolled arms. The velvet is a deep, rich blue color that I think would complement the intricate designs and patterns on the vase perfectly. What do you think about using a blue-and-white color scheme for the reading nook, with the vase and armchair as the focal points?
